channel.title: Zombie Survival Checklist
channel.description:
I'm putting together the ideal list of items to procure in the event of a zombie apocalypse. This is what I have so far:
Check list
-Kabar combat knife -Set of throwing knives (why not? may as well) -Radio -Tactical Kevlar vest -Hiking boots -Kevlar Helmet -Riot face-shield -Goggles -baklava -Gas mask + Extra filters -Set of Gloves
========
Ideal weaponry (Semi-auto civilian versions only) One from each category
-USP .45 -Beretta 9mm -Glock 9mm
-M4 -AK47
-Benilli M3 -Remington 870
-Crowbar -Machete
I'm sure I am forgetting something, but i cant remember a lot of my ideas right now.
Please add your ideas to the list until it becomes the go-to resource for a zombie plague.
Keep in mind that this stuff should be something a civilian can get their hand's on unless you list some workaround or other way to get it.
Let me also just say that my steam tag is broken, I am not always playing COD4, I don't consider myself an expert in anything these picks are just based on hours of ADD fueled research and personal opinions. I don't think the list is anywhere near perfect.

item.title: Zombie Survival Checklist
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
If push came to shove, I’d carry a large supply of explosives such as L4D-style pipebombs in case I got infected. If I feel murderous impulses, my intelligence going down, cravings for flesh, etc, I’d arm one, run into a crowd, and take out a shitload of zombies with me.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Survival Checklist
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
Katana’s full motorbike leathers inc gloves and boots of decent high quality CANNOT be chewed through, and any style of motor cycle helmet, preferably one with a wind shield to cover face from blood spills and bites, will also prevent bites to the neck.

I have a paranoid weed smoking friend who has thought this through a great deal

And no, its not sersoft.

-Shaved head

item.title: Zombie Survival Checklist
item.dc:creator: BaTz281
item.description:
Realistically (and by that I mean, under the assumption that an outbreak is possible) my biggest concern is going to be food/water. You can only stock so much in one place, and even if you’re on a farm and have animals and a large storage stocked up, there’s still a time limit.

The biggest problem is time - take, for example, Resident Evil: Extinction. In that movie, folks are down to raiding old convenience stores for canned goods, and the liquid contained therein doubles as your liquid intake. Since most of the world would conceivably be focused on straight up survival, the amount of production would decrease, and nobody would be restocking the Twinkies at your local 7-11. And even if you had a water filtration system, if shit REALLY hits the fan and electricity ceases to run, there’s no water getting pumped to your house and thus nothing to purify anyway. So you’d be down to recycling urine/rainwater/nearby creeks, if applicable.

That all said, you should also consider a first aid kid, various medications, some form of entertainment (think the mp3 player from “Book of Eli”) since there will be some periods of downtime in which you must maintain your sanity. Speaking of sanity, there’s sanitary - some way of cleaning yourself (alcohol wipes, for example).

Meh, all I could think of at the moment Time to sleep

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Survival Checklist
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Ham Solo:

Zombie outbreak… would fail pretty quick I think. So many armed people, military and police out there. Plus, nearly nobody will be as stupid as the people who get bitten/killed in movies. And animals, natural hazards and conditions, unability to build shelter or use weaponry…

I don’t think this thread is about the plausibility of an outbreak its just about if it should occur how you would supply yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Survival Checklist
item.dc:creator: Sgt_smiles
item.description:
i always thought that you would need something bite proof and bullet proof, in case there are some crazed survivors that mistake you for a zombie/crazed survivor. not to quote the survival guide.

personally i can never decide to either get a sniper rifle, or an assault rifle. not to brag but i am actually a pretty good shot, so i always thought it would be in my best interest to get myself a sniper rifle.

item.title: Zombie Survival Checklist
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
So here is my problem.

I am a real lousy shot. No really. I am really bad. No one wants to have me in their survival pod cuz I cant shoot worth a darn. Once I get my hands on my dads awesome arsenal and I can actually practice shooting a gun, I am sure I will get real good at it, but until then, I am stupid when it comes to shooting. This is why in game, I am UBER reliant on nades. :s adface:

My only hope (I think) would be a shotgun due to the massive spray per click of the trigger.

Thoughts from the peanut gallery?

Read full topic
